methodCategorySlug.description: Slugified method categorization string, e.g. func_approx/interpol/ipol_lin

modelCategorySlugs.description: Slugified model categorization string, e.g. pb/qm/dft

subtype.description: General subtype of the method (if applicable)

parameters.description: Keyworded collection of method parameters (numerically relevant)

precision.description: Object showing the actual possible precision based on theory and implementation

data.description: Additional numerically relevant data specific to method, eg. array of pseudopotentials

metaParams.description: Parameters for further specification of the method (numerically not relevant)
